title: Old Space meets New Space: A decade later and beyond
summary: The article reflects on the evolution of the space industry over the past decade, highlighting the convergence of 'old space' (legacy contractors like Boeing and Lockheed Martin) and 'new space' (companies like SpaceX, Blue Origin, and ICEYE). It discusses industry growth, collaboration, challenges, and future prospects, including lunar missions, space tourism, and AI integration. ICEYE is mentioned as a company that has revolutionized small satellite radar imaging systems, but no concrete deal involving ICEYE is described.

entities.name: ICEYE
